argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Failure to maintain minimum hot water temperature required for habitable premises
argumentsAndDecisions.violatedCode: CSFRA and International Property Maintenance Code (IPMC) - minimum 110 degrees Fahrenheit requirement
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Hearing Officer determined 110-degree Fahrenheit standard was appropriate based on IPMC and City's Multifamily Housing Inspection Department
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Constitutes a failure to maintain habitable premises
